scene_description_enriched: An angel with large green wings, wearing a golden robe, gestures towards a kneeling woman dressed in a red robe with fur trim. The angel appears to be speaking or delivering a message. The woman looks up at the angel with a supplicating expression, her hands clasped in prayer. The background depicts a green, rolling landscape under a sky with dramatic clouds. This scene depicts the Annunciation, where the Angel Gabriel announces to the Virgin Mary that she will conceive Jesus.
